Don't change here, override in /usr/lib/mailman/Mailman/mm_cfg.py /etc/mailman/sitelist.cfg - Mailman behavior and settings. /etc/mailman/mm_cfg.py is a softlink to /usr/lib/mailman/Mailman/mm_cfg.py Create Mailing Lists: RHE5 / CentOS 5 / Fedora Core 3,4,5,6 / Mailman 2.1.5 RPM: Generate default list "mailman": This requires the manual creation of the default list "mailman" and the entry for the aliases file:  [root prompt]# /usr/lib/mailman/bin/newlist mailman - Creates a mailing list called mailman. Enter the email address of the person running the list: admin@supermegacorp.com Initial mailman password: - Type it correctly. There is no verification! This will generate "aliases" entry to cut and paste to your MTA aliases file (see Sendmail or Postfix configurations below). Generate test email list: /usr/lib/mailman/bin/newlist test Test with a list of one or two of your own email addresses.
